name: CIM10
description: CIM10 is a versatile IoT edge platform designed to drive digital transformation at scale within budget and on time. It simplifies, secures, and streamlines the process of connecting plants anytime, anywhere, enabling digital transformation in the water, manufacturing, and building industries. CIMCON Edge 360 provides an Edge platform with a secure cloud environment and the necessary technology to make digital transformation directly accessible to industry. CIM10 supports industry needs to increase performance from assets, collaborate better, and generate more value from current systems, resulting in greater business agility, quicker insight, lower operating costs, and quicker ROI from digital transformation projects. It assists industry in conducting business in real-time and making better decisions by streamlining processes, acting before any deviation or fault occurs, optimizing operations, and enhancing safety.

name: VIBit Battery Powered
description: The VIBit Battery Powered is a state-of-the-art vibration sensor that monitors vibration levels in industrial assets, helping to detect early signs of wear and tear, and providing actionable insights to prevent costly downtime. It's available in both wired and battery-powered options, making it suitable for a wide range of applications. A key component of CIMCON Digital's MachineAstro, a machine-learning platform that helps machine OEMs analyze data and make decisions to reach their net zero goals.

name: VIBit Lite
description: The VIBit Lite is a state-of-the-art vibration sensor that monitors vibration levels in industrial assets, helping to detect early signs of wear and tear, and providing actionable insights to prevent costly downtime. It's available in both wired and battery-powered options, making it suitable for a wide range of applications. A key component of CIMCON Digital's MachineAstro, a machine-learning platform that helps machine OEMs analyze data and make decisions to reach their net zero goals.

name: iEdge 360
description: CIMCON iEdge 360 is an edge platform that provides a secure cloud environment and all the necessary technology to make digital transformation directly accessible to industry. It encourages and eases the IIoT transition among various industries. The platform supports operational excellence, increasing performance from assets, fostering collaboration, and generating more value from existing systems. This leads to greater business agility, quicker insights, lower operating costs, and faster ROI from digital transformation projects. CIMCON iEdge 360 helps streamline processes, optimize operations, and enhance safety, enabling businesses to operate in real-time and make informed decisions.

name: CIMcloud
description: CIMcloud is a cloud platform that provides a secure and reliable environment for data storage, processing, and analysis. It offers features like advanced management of user roles and permissions, a rule engine, and email alerts. CIMcloud also supports streaming data to major clouds like AWS and Microsoft Azure using MQTT Protocol, ensuring seamless integration with existing IT systems. The platform also includes out-of-the-box dashboards for OEE, Machine Health, Energy Analytics, and Performance Monitoring, providing real-time insights and actionable data for informed decision making.

name: CIMdata
description: CIMdata is a data platform designed to provide a secure and reliable environment for managing and analyzing data from industrial assets. It offers features like advanced data integration, data visualization, and data analytics capabilities. CIMdata also includes a built-in rule engine for anomaly detection and alerts, ensuring proactive maintenance and improved operational efficiency. The platform is designed to provide real-time insights and actionable data for informed decision making, optimizing operations and improving overall asset performance.

name: Machine Astro
description: Machine Astro is a machine-learning platform that helps machine OEMs analyze data and make decisions to reach their net zero goals. It uses advanced algorithms to identify patterns and predict potential issues, enabling proactive maintenance and improved operational efficiency. Machine Astro provides real-time insights and actionable data, empowering machine OEMs to optimize performance, reduce downtime, and achieve their sustainability goals.

name: Anomaly Detection
description: CIMCON Digital's Anomaly Detection solution leverages advanced algorithms to identify unusual patterns and deviations in industrial asset data. This allows for early detection of potential issues, enabling proactive maintenance and preventing costly downtime. The solution provides real-time alerts and detailed reports, empowering operators to take timely action and optimize asset performance.

name: Muni-AI Chatbot
description: The Muni-AI Chatbot is an AI-powered conversational interface designed to provide real-time insights and support for industrial asset management. It leverages natural language processing to understand user queries and provide relevant information, including asset performance data, maintenance schedules, and historical records. The chatbot also offers proactive alerts and recommendations, helping operators optimize asset performance and reduce downtime.

name: VIBit Lite
description: VIBit Lite is a powerful vibration sensor designed for predictive maintenance. It provides accurate and reliable data on machine vibration, temperature, and more. With its 3-Axis acceleration RMS, 3-Axis Velocity RMS, temperature monitoring, and 1-10x FFT features, VIBit Lite offers unmatched precision for monitoring machine performance. The product offers the same level of reliability as CIMCON Digital’s flagship product, VIBit, without the need to stream data into the cloud.

description: VIBit Battery Powered is a wireless vibration sensor that can be used to monitor the health of industrial equipment. name: CIM10
description: CIM10 is an intelligent edge device that can be used to collect and analyze data from industrial equipment. It is compatible with VIBit Lite and can be used to run advanced AI-based anomaly detection and diagnostic algorithms to predict and report on various faults such as misalignment, imbalance, structural and rotating looseness, soft foot, and more.
